detail_desc: Short romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders. Press-studs on one shoulder, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric containing some linen and cotton. Stand-up collar with a tab and button, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Macramé handbag made from cotton with two round plastic handles. Unlined. Size 6x24x31 cm.
Short top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust with a double flounce below.
Trousers in a viscose weave with jacquard-weave stripes. Regular waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Warm-lined hi-tops in suede with leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, fluted soles.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Straight-cut dress in a textured weave with narrow double shoulder straps with one pair that cross at the back. Unlined.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a sailor collar in a contrasting colour, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Shorts with detachable, elastic braces, an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, and fake pockets.
Cold shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with elastication at the shoulders. Partly lined in jersey.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.

A-line skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Unlined. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline, and 3/4-length, open sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Headband knitted in a soft wool blend with a twisted detail at the front.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Unlined.
Pyjamas in a cool, patterned viscose weave with piping. Shirt with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight legs.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Popover jacket in close-fitting jersey with padded sections in woven fabric, a padded hood and a wind flap at the top with press-studs. Tunnel pocket at the front and long sleeves with thumbholes. Lined. Polyester filling.
Shorts in woven fabric with decorative, shiny buttons at the front, a high waist and shaping darts at the back. Concealed zip in one side with a button at the top, and rounded hems.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.

Cropped cardigan in a cable knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, fully-fashioned sleeves and ribbed trims around the neckline, button band, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a soft weave with concealed buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pleats for extra width at the hem. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Stretch twill treggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and decorations on the legs.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Suit trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and legs with creases. Diagonal side pockets and fake back pockets with a decorative button.

Studio Collection. Soft bra in patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined, triangular cups, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a visible seam down the front, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and raw-edges at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Mittens knitted in a wool blend with a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with pleats at the top of the shoulders, short sleeves and a box pleat at the back of the neck.
Mittens in soft faux fur with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.
Sturdy slip in stretch microfibre with a sculpting effect on the tummy, bum and thighs. Lace cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Round-necked jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with a gathered frill around the neckline, and press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist and a frill trim at the back.
Pleated, calf-length skirt with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Patterned wellingtons with chunky, fluted soles.
Long-sleeved, striped top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Knee-length, flared skirt in crinkled, patterned chiffon with a high waist, concealed zip in the side and tiered flounces. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with elastic shoulder straps, an elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and straight hem.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in leather with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and extra-long, straight legs. Satin lining.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems and short slits in the sides.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves, and elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Short, off-the shoulder top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and a drawstring at the front.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.

Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with visible seams at the front, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back, one pair of which can be tied. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Wrapover front with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover front.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Round-necked top in hole-patterned jersey. Puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the hems.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back and scalloped hem. Lined.
T-shirts in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

prod_name: Rachel or Merry HW Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, long sleeves and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Belt in imitation leather with a perforated pattern and metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Dungaree dress in soft, patterned organic cotton corduroy with a pocket at the top, concealed press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with a button.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
